thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 08 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Yifeng Pharmacy Chain and unit to buy pharmacy related assets for totalling 75.2 mln yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Yifeng Pharmacy Chain and unit to buy pharmacy related assets for totalling 75.2 mln yuan

organizations.name: reuters) - yifeng pharmacy chain co ltd

text:
Jan 8 (Reuters) - Yifeng Pharmacy Chain Co Ltd
* Says it will buy all assets of Liuyang-based pharmacy chain firm for 35 million yuan
* Says Jiangxi-based pharmacy unit will buy 60 percent stake in Jiangxi-based pharmacy chain firm for 40.2 million yuan
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/4nGmvV
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
